title: Trigger Types
body:
Trigger Types¶

A contact will be enrolled in a workflow when a certain trigger occurs.
The trigger types offered when creating a workflow are defined below.

  1. Topic Update: Enroll contact when they are added to or removed from a topic

  2. List Update: Enroll contact when they are added to or removed from a list

  3. Property Update: Enroll contact when a property is changed

  4. Email Open: Enroll contacts when they open an email

  5. Manual Enrollment: Enroll contacts manually on an ongoing basis
